dcterms:creator: Dimitri Zhukov

dcterms:description: CrossTask contains instructional videos collected for 83 different events, which are divided into 18 primary and 65 related events. It includes 2750 videos with an average of 7.6 actions per video.
dcterms:title: CrossTask

dcterms:creator: Jean-Baptiste Alayrac
Piotr Bojanowski
Nishant Agrawal
Josef Sivic
Ivan Laptev
Simon Lacoste-Julien
dcterms:description: Narrated Instructional Videos (NIV) is a dataset collected from real-world instruction videos from the Internet, containing 150 videos of five events, with an average of 9.5 actions per video.
dcterms:title: Narrated Instructional Videos (NIV)

dcterms:description: COIN is a large labeled instructional video dataset, collected from YouTube, consisting of 11827 videos related to 778 different actions, with an average of 3.6 actions per video.
dcterms:title: COIN
